item.title: 穆巴达拉将全面控制土耳其外卖应用 Getir
item.description: 阿布扎比穆巴达拉投资公司（Abu Dhabi's Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Investment Co. is poised to take sole control of Turkish grocery delivery startup Getir after a power struggle that followed the startup’s decline following Covid-19-era lockdowns.】

item.title: 欧洲央行衡量工资增长的关键指标在可能降息前放缓
item.description: 衡量欧元区工资增长的一项关键指标有所放缓；这为欧洲中央银行官员下周寻求降低利率提供了进一步保证。【原文：A key measure of euro-zone wage growth eased — providing further assurance to European Central Bank officials seeking to lower interest rates next week.】

item.title: 欧元区第二季度经济增长低于预期
item.description: 欧元区第二季度经济增长势头放缓，这是欧洲中央银行收到的最新一条坏消息。【原文：Euro-area momentum slowed in the second quarter, the latest piece of bad economic news for the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 马杜罗很可能经受住美国对其盟友和帮凶的制裁
item.description: 尽管尼古拉斯-马杜罗（Nicolás Maduro）在委内瑞拉备受争议的大选之后在国内外的合法性进一步削弱，但他仍有一个优势：美国无力打击他的痛处。【原文：Even as Nicolás Maduro’s legitimacy at home and abroad withers further following Venezuela’s highly contested election, he still has one advantage: The US can’t afford to hit him where it hurts most.】

item.title: 美国海上风电场延期，耐克森将销售目光投向欧洲
item.description: 耐克森公司（Nexans SA）首席执行官克里斯托弗-盖兰（Christopher Guérin）表示，由于美国海上风电场的延期，耐克森公司正在欧洲为其在南卡罗来纳州生产的海底电缆寻找买家。【原文：A delayed US offshore wind farm has Nexans SA looking to Europe for buyers for its undersea electric cables made in South Carolina, Chief Executive Officer Christopher Guérin said.】

item.title: 经济衰退即将到来？英镑的下一步是什么？问题解答
item.description: 对于市场来说，这是一个动荡的夏天。当人们从暑假归来，准备迎接今年的最后一段假期时，《今日市场》团队向我们的 Instagram 关注者询问了他们想知道的问题。问题包括如何判断经济和货币前景、股票交易趋势以及如何看待公司财报。以下是我们的答案。【原文：It’s been a turbulent summer for markets. As people return from their summer holidays with the final part of the year in view, the team at Markets Today asked our Instagram followers what they wanted to know. The questions ranged from how to gauge the outlook for the economy and currencies, to trends in stock trading and how to approach a company earnings report. Here — in a lightly edited transcript — are our answers.】

item.title: 央行降息前 AT1 债券销售创下单周纪录
item.description: 自全球金融危机后推出这种高风险银行债券以来，银行本周的额外一级债券发行工作最为繁忙。【原文：Banks are having their busiest week of issuance of Additional Tier 1 bonds since this risky type of bank debt was introduced in the wake of the global financial crisis.】

item.title: 正在蓬勃发展的加密货币应用案例
item.description:
是的，真的。【原文：

Yes, really.

】

item.title: 印度尼西亚 Waskita Karya 公司签署 17 亿美元债务重组协议
item.description: 印尼建筑商 PT Waskita Karya 与贷款人达成协议，重组价值 26.3 万亿印尼盾（17 亿美元）的贷款，缓解了这家陷入困境的公司的部分压力。【原文：Indonesian builder PT Waskita Karya reached an agreement with lenders to restructure 26.3 trillion rupiah ($1.7 billion)-worth of loans, easing some pressure off the distressed company.】

item.title: 南非以关键矿产和汽车生产技能吸引比亚迪
item.description: 南非政府一位高级官员表示，比亚迪公司与南非就这家中国电动汽车制造商可能进行投资的谈判正在取得进展，但双方尚未就下一步措施的具体时间框架达成一致。【原文：Talks are progressing between BYD Co. and South Africa over a possible investment by the Chinese electric vehicle manufacturer, a top government official said, although no specific time frame for the next steps has been agreed.】

item.title: 大选将如何影响美中关系
item.description:
在《梅林谈钱》（Merryn Talks Money）节目中，埃诺多经济公司首席经济学家戴安娜-乔伊列娃（Diana Choyleva）讨论了根据胜负可能发生的变化。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, Enodo Economics Chief Economist Diana Choyleva discusses what could change—depending on who wins.

】

item.title: 空中客车公司八月向航空公司交付 47 架喷气式飞机，迎接夏日的冷清
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）8 月份向航空公司客户交付了 47 架新喷气式飞机，距离其修订后的全年交付 770 架商用喷气式飞机的目标越来越近。【原文：Airbus SE handed over 47 new jets to airline customers in August, inching closer to its revised full-year target of 770 commercial jet deliveries.】

item.title: 德国准备出资 220 亿美元改造南非电网
item.description: 南非表示，为了将更多的太阳能和风能纳入国家电网并确保能源安全，南非需要 3,900 亿兰特（220 亿美元）的资金，德国愿意为这笔资金提供帮助。【原文：Germany is willing to help fund the 390 billion rand ($22 billion) that South Africa said it needs to incorporate more solar and wind power into the national grid and ensure its energy security.】

item.title: 前 Eurazeo 首席执行官莫尔贡计划成立以气候为重点的私募股权投资基金
item.description: 维吉妮-莫尔贡（Virginie Morgon）是 Eurazeo SE 的前首席执行官，也是欧洲私募股权投资领域最资深的女性之一。【原文：Virginie Morgon, Eurazeo SE’s ex-chief executive officer and one of the most senior women in European private equity, is striking out on her own with a new private equity firm focused on sustainable investments.】

item.title: 埃及供应忧虑再起，欧洲天然气涨势扩大
item.description: 由于埃及出现了燃料竞争更加激烈的迹象，欧洲天然气价格涨幅扩大。【原文：European natural gas prices extended gains as signs of more intense competition for fuel emerged from Egypt.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称英国央行降息后英国房价涨幅扩大
item.description: 哈利法克斯（Halifax）的数据显示，在英格兰银行将利率从 16 年高点下调后，英国房价连续第二个月攀升。【原文：UK house prices climbed for a second straight month after the Bank of England cut interest rates from a 16-year high, data from Halifax showed.】

item.title: 德国工业生产因汽车制造业而下降
item.description: 德国 7 月份工业生产下降，凸显了欧洲最大经济体在上一季度意外萎缩后的潜在问题。【原文：German industrial production dropped in July — highlighting the underlying troubles of Europe’s largest economy after it unexpectedly shrank last quarter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市有望继续连跌
item.description: 2023年9月4日星期一，英国吉尔福德的一条半独立式房屋街道。据一家大型抵押贷款机构称，由于借贷成本紧缩导致需求减少，8 月份英国住房市场的低迷态势进一步加剧。摄影师：Jason Alden/Bloomberg【原文：A street of semi-detached houses in Guildford, UK, on Monday, Sept. 4, 2023. The downturn gripping the UK housing market steepened in August as the cost-of-borrowing squeeze sapped demand, according to a major mortgage lender. Photographer: Jason Alden/Bloomberg】

item.title: 比特币在关键的美国就业数据公布前追随股市走势
item.description: 如果加密货币与股票之间的短期相关性不断上升，那么比特币和其他主要数字代币将随着股市对周五晚些时候发布的一份重要美国就业报告的反应而起舞。【原文：Bitcoin and other major digital tokens are set to dance to the tune of the stock market’s reaction to a key US jobs report due later Friday, if a rising short-term correlation between crypto and equities is any guide.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 做空者因中国贸易争端风险围攻沃尔沃汽车和保时捷
item.description: 随着对欧洲汽车业的担忧日益加剧，做空者也开始选择他们的目标。【原文：As worries pile up for Europe’s autos industry, short sellers have been choosing their targets.】

item.title: 据说字节跳动将为汽车应用 Dongchedi 筹集 6 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）正在为其汽车信息和交易平台东车网筹集高达 6 亿美元的资金。【原文：ByteDance Ltd. is raising as much as $600 million for its car information and trading platform Dongchedi, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 本次大选中，税收对市场的影响并不确定
item.description:
特朗普与哈里斯的博弈归根结底是 "视情况而定"。【原文：

Gaming out the Trump-Harris scenarios comes down to “it depends.”

】

item.title: 经理离职后，StanChart 调整了技术部门的一些重要职位
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）是一家专注于亚洲市场的贷款机构，在一名高管离职后，渣打银行对技术和运营部门的一些重要职位进行了调整。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc reshuffled some key roles in technology and operations after the departure of a senior executive at the Asia focused lender.】

item.title: 轰动一时的中国合并计划让未参与合并的公司股价飙升
item.description: 国泰君安证券股份有限公司（Guotai Junan Securities Co.）和海通证券股份有限公司（Haitong Securities Co.【原文：A small Chinese brokerage has emerged as an unlikely winner from the merger plan of industry leaders Guotai Junan Securities Co. and Haitong Securities Co., thanks to its name.】

item.title: 花旗称美国大选风险将使金属暂时受限
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Uncertainty around the US presidential election in November will prevent meaningful gains for metals by subduing global risk appetite and possibly delaying government stimulus in China, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 日元观察家警惕美国非农就业数据考验八月高点
item.description: 货币策略师们认为，如果薪资数据提振对美联储本月大幅降息的押注，那么日元兑美元汇率很有可能在周五晚些时候测试8月份的高点。【原文：Currency strategists see a strong chance of the yen testing its August high versus the dollar later Friday if payrolls data boost bets for a jumbo rate cut by the Federal Reserve this month.】

item.title: 中国收益率曲线陡峭化，中国人民银行回击债券涨势
item.description: 由于干预威胁促使交易商放缓购买长期债券，中国的主权收益率曲线正在陡峭化，这一举动可能会受到当局的欢迎。【原文：China’s sovereign yield curve is steepening, a move that’s likely to be welcomed by authorities, as the threat of intervention prompts traders to slow purchases of longer term bonds.】

item.title: 世界上最雄心勃勃的摩天大楼翻新计划
item.description:
位于伦敦的这座45层高的大厦计划进行彻底改造。KPF 建筑师阐述了他对这座大厦未来的展望和面临的挑战。【原文：

The 45-story tower in London is slated for a radical remake. The KPF architect lays out his vision of its future and the challenges ahead. 

】

item.title: 民调显示：尽管经济疲软，欧洲央行仍将继续季度减息
item.description: 根据一项对分析师的调查，欧洲中央银行不会通过更快地降低利率来应对欧元区经济的疲软。【原文：The European Central Bank won’t react to a weakening euro-zone economy by lowering interest rates more rapidly, according to a survey of analysts.】
